mapper.select:

'%Y-%m-%d')),'-') as B12, IFNULL(CONCAT("\t",date_format(b.out_time, '%Y-%m-%d')),'-') as B15, IFNULL(b.health_card,'-') as A47, IFNULL(b.pay_way_code,'-') as A46C, IFNULL(b.`name`,'-') as A11, as D12, IFNULL(c.zhylfwl03,0) as D13, IFNULL(c.zhylfwl04,0) as D14, IFNULL(c.zdl01,0) as D15, IFNULL(c.zdl02,0) as D16, IFNULL(c.zdl03,0) as D17, IFNULL(c.zdl04,0) as D18, IFNULL(c.zll01,0) as D19, IFNULL(c.xyl01,0) as D23x01, IFNULL(c.fy04,0) as D24, IFNULL(c.fy05,0) as D25, IFNULL(c.xyzpl01,0) as D26, IFNULL(c.xyzpl02,0) as D27, IFNULL(c.xyzpl03,0) as D28, IFNULL(c.xyzpl04,0) as D29, 0 as D30, IFNULL(c.hcl01,0) as D31, IFNULL( c.hcl02,0) as D32, IFNULL(c.hcl03,0) as D33, IFNULL(c.hcl03,0) as D33, IFNULL(c.fy06,0) as D34 from mris_base_info b LEFT JOIN mris_cost c on b.hosp_code = c.hosp_code and b.visit_id = c.visit_id where b.hosp_code= #{hospCode} and b.in_profile IS NOT NULL AND b.out_time IS NOT NULL
and b.visit_id =#{visitId}
limit #{offset}, #{limit}

select disease_code,disease_code2,in_situation_code1,in_situation_code2,disease_icd10_1,disease_icd10_2,disease_icd10_name1,disease_icd10_name2 from mris_diagnose where visit_id =#{visitId} and hosp_code =#{hospCode}
select * from upload_type where valid_flage ='0' and hosp_code =#{hospCode} and type=#{type} limit 1
